title: Ménage à 3 Vol. 1
description: Set in Montreal, a man, Gary, catches his male roommates humping each other and they agree to move out. A young boyish looking woman, Zii, and another woman, Didi, move in.This collection collections the webcomic Ménage à 3 from May 17 2008 to May 14 2009.Bonus features include:• 8 new chapter break illustrations• "Pants très bien!" An all new 5-page print exclusive bonus story! SEE Zii take Gary pants shopping!MARVEL at Gary's new look!BE HORRIFIED at the sight of Gary wearing Zii's panties!All this AND meet for the first time a BRAND NEW Ma3 GIRL, exclusive to this story!
author: Gisèle Lagacé
